articles.author: Jon Porter
articles.title: Listen to this amazing remaster of Super Mario World’s soundtrack - The Verge
articles.description: Fans are remastering the soundtrack to Super Mario World, revealing uncompressed versions of the tracks that were never possible on the Super Nintendo. You can listen to nine tracks from the original game over on YouTube.
articles.content:

Made using the musics uncompressed audio samples
